mapper.sql: DROP TABLE `order_detail`; CREATE TABLE `order_detail` ( PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ,UNIQUE KEY `uniq_id` (`id`) , `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '订单详情ID' , `goods_serial_num` VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '商品编号' DEFAULT '' , `goods_name` VARCHAR(20) COMMENT '商品名称' DEFAULT '' , `danwei` VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '单位' DEFAULT '' , `buy_count` INT(4) COMMENT '购买数量' DEFAULT '' , `price` DECIMAL(9,2) COMMENT '商品单价' DEFAULT '' , `mark` VARCHAR(200) COMMENT '备注' DEFAULT '' , `guige_one` VARCHAR(500) COMMENT '用户购买的商品规格一' DEFAULT '' , `guige_two` VARCHAR(500) COMMENT '用户购买的商品规格二' DEFAULT '' , `guige_three` VARCHAR(500) COMMENT '用户购买的商品规格三' DEFAULT '' , `guige_four` VARCHAR(500) COMMENT '用户购买的商品规格四' DEFAULT '' , `order_main_id` BIGINT(20) COMMENT '订单ID' DEFAULT '' , `goods_id` BIGINT(20) COMMENT '商品ID' DEFAULT '' , `create_time` DATETIME COMMENT '下单日期' , `update_time` DATETIME COMMENT '更新日期' , `operator` DATETIME COMMENT '操作人' DEFAULT '' )

id ,goods_serial_num goodsSerialNum,goods_name goodsName,danwei ,buy_count buyCount,price ,mark ,guige_one guigeOne,guige_two guigeTwo,guige_three guigeThree,guige_four guigeFour,order_main_id orderMainId,goods_id goodsId,create_time createTime,update_time updateTime,operator
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into order_detail (goods_serial_num,goods_name,danwei,buy_count,price,mark,guige_one,guige_two,guige_three,guige_four,order_main_id,goods_id,create_time,update_time,operator) values( '' #{goodsSerialNum} , '' #{goodsName} , '' #{danwei} , '' #{buyCount} , '' #{price} , '' #{mark} , '' #{guigeOne} , '' #{guigeTwo} , '' #{guigeThree} , '' #{guigeFour} , '' #{orderMainId} , '' #{goodsId} , now() #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , now() #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , '' #{operator} )
mapper.update:
update order_detail set goods_serial_num=#{goodsSerialNum}, goods_name=#{goodsName}, danwei=#{danwei}, buy_count=#{buyCount}, price=#{price}, mark=#{mark}, guige_one=#{guigeOne}, guige_two=#{guigeTwo}, guige_three=#{guigeThree}, guige_four=#{guigeFour}, order_main_id=#{orderMainId}, goods_id=#{goodsId}, create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator=#{operator},
where
mapper.delete:
delete from order_detail where id in
#{id}
